description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take your avatar on a journey and test your logic as you solve 70+ puzzles!  Play with a friend and compete for best times and scores or work together to solve the puzzles! Share your skills with the world by getting a spot on the global scoreboard! (Supports Stereoscopic 3D viewing with no glasses via the 'Crossview 3D' method)
description.short: Take your avatar on a journey and test your logic as you solve 70+ puzzles!  Play with a friend and compete for best times and scores or work together to solve the puzzles!
